review: We are incredibly grateful to Dr. Meghna for her exceptional care during my pregnancy. Her expertise and compassionate guidance ensured a smooth journey, resulting in the healthy birth of our baby. Dr. Meghna's attention to detail and unwavering support made us feel confident and well-cared for throughout. We highly recommend her to anyone seeking a dedicated and skilled doctor.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very good experience.Doctor is very friendly.She is very polite and listened my problem and then  she treated.

I went for consultation, already had taken urine test and knew was pregnant and wished to abort, all she did was prescribe more tests and took her and few and asked to get back. Once tests were done she refused to give prescription for pill and was trying to force to come for a second consultation. Yet gladly gave the name of the kit which actually costs 230/- and the same thing she wishes to charge me 3k for and then refuses to give any guidance regarding it and says it's not her responsibility. ***** ** ********** *** ***** ***** ****** ** *** ** **** Very disappointed

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Initially the doctor seemed to be very friendly and gave me medicines for 10 days. After 10 days when I was not cured she told online  perform some tests and when I told her to see my reports she again demanded full fees from me. I told her I am a student and it's not possible for me to pay the entire fees after every 7 days. To which she saw my report online very reluctantly and didn't suggest me any further medication or treatment. ** ***** *** ***** ** **** ********* *** ** **** ***** **** *** **** *** ******* ** **** ** *** ******* *** ***** *** *** *** **** **** **** ***** *** **** **** **** **** ** ********* ** ***** * ****
reply_text: The consultation fees is charged for any repeat follow-up consultation after 7 days of initial consultation. It's unfortunate that you did not get well despite initial treatment which can happen at times. I suggest you to visit the clinic in person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Thank you so much. ❤

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Meghana Lal is the most friendliest doctor I've ever came across. I didn't have to wait at all, she discussed everything in detail, even after my appointment she kept in touch with me and discussed the further details as well. She is still in touch with me, and it feels really nice that she actually cares about her patients a lot. I've recently left India, but Dr. Meghana, despite the distance, still makes sure that I am okay. Highly recommended!
